Review_title: TRUE STORY OF THE DARING SCIENTISTS WHO MAY SAVE US FROM EXTINCTION
Review_Text:
Let us begin with the ICE and how it got from A to B
ICE is the internal combustion engine and almost 3 billion people have 1 or 5 of them.TRUE STORY OF THE DARING SCIENTISTS WHO MAY SAVE US FROM EXTINCTION is the documentary story of an effort to understand if we have no future or how gloomy is it truly.A truly inspiring window of truth as billions of onlookers wait for that messive storm to strike home in the night when the power is off.The brink of life is sliding but Mars is nearby. We can hop over their until Earth heals,right ? WRONGEnjoy the movie as danger lurks every day we look in the mirror to say what is what is means we gave up on our planet.
